page.title: 06Entertainment
page.content: This rural area has events which reflect the interest and capacities o the small communities. Tuddenham Hall provides the venue for a summmer fete in id of Tuddenham church. Plyford hs n annual fete for the benefit of Parochil church Council and Bealings fete in aid of church funds. Garens of the bigger houses are occasionally opened during summer months in aid of charities such as St John's Ambulance Brigade, Red Cross, Sufolk Trust for Nature conservation. A drama group at Bealings stage productions three times a year. Rushmere Baptist Church runs an annual Holiday club during schools' summer break. Christmas bazzaars are run in aid of all the churches, also charities and the residential home.
